backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing user profiles, hydration/sleep/running logs, rewards, reminders, and access control with associated storage maps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old userRewards records to a new format by adding lastUpdated.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new streak-break reminder features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all major frontend components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file specifying optional Internet Identity URL.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide explaining local build/deploy steps and documenting a previously fixed frontend build failure.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app shell handling authentication, profile setup, navigation tabs, and integration of reminder and tracking components.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name profile.
frontend/src/components/history/EmptySta: UI card shown when no history exists, encouraging users to start logging intake.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryV: Displays water intake history with stats, sorted logs, and progress indicators, falling back to loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/intake/QuickAddI: Allows quick or custom water intake logging and triggers reward-related toasts based on changes.
frontend/src/components/intake/TodayProg: Shows today's hydration progress, streak info, and triggers a celebration when the user meets their goal.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app header with branding, greeting, and login button based on user profile.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Displays an in‑app reminder banner with contextual icons and dismiss capability.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Manages global reminder settings and CRUD operations for custom reminders, including streak‑break settings.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Streak: Initializes the streak‑break reminder hook without rendering UI.
frontend/src/components/rewards/BadgesGr: Shows all badge types with unlocked states, icons, and styling variations.
frontend/src/components/rewards/GoalCele: Displays a full‑screen celebratory card with animations when a user hits a hydration goal.
frontend/src/components/rewards/RewardsP: Shows user reward stats, streaks, completed goals, and earned badges with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/running/RunHisto: Fetches and displays running history with stats like total distance and pace, plus loading and empty views.
frontend/src/components/running/RunLogFo: Form for logging a run with distance, duration, and completion status, including validation and submission.
frontend/src/components/running/RunningV: Combines the run log form and running history list into a single view.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Displays and updates user hydration settings like daily goal and cup size with validation and saving.
frontend/src/components/sleep/SleepHisto: Shows sleep history with average stats, progress bars, and daily entries, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/sleep/SleepLogFo: Form for logging sleep hours with validation and submission handling.
Combines the sleep log form and sleep history list into one view.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading identities, login flow, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, settings, intake, rewards, and related mutations with cache invalidation.
Manages local hydration reminders using notifications or in‑app prompts, with start/stop controls and interval persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useReminderSchedulerC: Context-based reminder scheduler supporting multiple reminder types, notifications, in‑app fallback, and manual reminder firing.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreakBreakReminde: Checks hydration streak progress and triggers a streak‑break warning reminder near end of day with daily anti‑spam logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark mode, and custom utility animations and classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Declares Vite-specific environment variable typings for TypeScript.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended colors mapped to CSS variables, custom radii, shadows, and keyframes.
project_state.json: Stores the project's current state, feature list, issues, and architectural notes for tracking development progress.
